title: Announcing Aspose.Pdf for .NET
topic: Release of Aspose.Pdf library for .NET
excerpt: **March 18, 2003 – Sydney, Australia –** It is with great pleasure that we announce Aspose.Pdf for .NET, a class library for working with PDF files from within .NET applications. It is designed to be easy to use, yet powerful enough to handle a wide variety of developer demands. Aspose creates components for developers who need to work with popular file formats from within their own applications.
